page.title: 05Recreation
page.content: Our area has many recreational facilities for all ages. There are such things as Amusement Arcades, discos and youth clubs at all Comprehensive schools for the young. There is also a bowling green in swinton and bingo halls in Mexborough and Wath for people who prefer more gentle activities. Both Swinton and Wath have swimming pools which also offer swimming and life saving lessons. squash is another sport which is widely catered for in our area. All other sports are catered for at large sports grounds and public parks in all parts of the area.
